titles.title: My Soul Be On Thy Guard

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: My soul be on thy guard; newline Ten thousand foes arise; newline The hosts of sin are pressing hard newline To draw you from the skies.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Oh, watch and fight and pray; newline The battle ne'er give o'er. newline Renew it boldly ev'ry day, newline And help divine implore.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Ne'er think the vict'ry won, newline Nor lay thine armor down; newline The work of faith will not be done newline Till thou obtain the crown.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Fight on, my soul, till death newline Shall bring thee to thy God; newline He'll take thee, at thy parting breath, newline To His divine abode.
